name: GetVendorList
description:
Retrieve a list of available vendors.

This tool retrieves a list of vendors from the Ramp service. It should be called when you need to access or display vendor information.

parameters.name: filter_by_category_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of integers to filter vendors by Ramp Category Codes.

value_schema.description: Show only vendors whose sk_category_id matches a [Ramp Category Code](/developer-api/v1/overview/conventions#ramp-category-codes) in the passed list. Expects a comma-separated list of integers.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Filter vendors created after this date. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Show only vendors with created_at after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: ID of the last entity from the previous page to retrieve the next set of results. Used for pagination.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of vendor results to return per page, between 2 and 100. The default is 20 if not provided.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

parameters.name: vendor_owner_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the vendor. Provide a valid user ID string.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the user which owns this vendor.

parameters.name: vendor_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendors by name. Provide a string to match vendor names containing this value.

parameters.name: include_only_active_vendors
parameters.description: Set to true to show only active vendors. False includes all vendors.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: sk_category_ids
parameters.description: Show only vendors whose sk_category_id matches a [Ramp Category Code](/developer-api/v1/overview/conventions#ramp-category-codes) in the passed list. Expects a comma-separated list of integers.

value_schema.description: Show only vendors whose sk_category_id matches a [Ramp Category Code](/developer-api/v1/overview/conventions#ramp-category-codes) in the passed list. Expects a comma-separated list of integers.

parameters.name: from_created_at
parameters.description: Show only vendors with created_at after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

value_schema.description: Show only vendors with created_at after this date. This parameter should be provided as a datetime string that conforms to ISO 8601

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

parameters.name: vendor_owner_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user which owns this vendor.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the user which owns this vendor.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
